Text.Value: I really need to tell Lae'zel about these discs. If only so she'll take them off my hands...
Tir'su are inscribed on this slate as well. I should look closer.
Another of those strange disks. Perhaps Lae'zel can shed some light on their meaning.
A third disc. Lae'zel will want to see this.
A third disc with githyanki writing? Looks right up Lae'zel's alley.
Another disc. Lae'zel will be all over this.
Another githyanki artefact. If anyone knows their meaning, it will Lae'zel.
Yet another githyanki disc. We must consult Lae'zel.
Another slate. Lae'zel should have a look.
Still another githyanki disc. I'll see what Lae'zel has to say.

EditorData.logicalname: Third book found - Previous not unlocked yet

Text.Value: Another gith disc. Another thing to show Lae'zel.
Another githyanki disc, marked with tir'su.
A second githyanki disc. Lae'zel will want to see this.
Another githyanki disc. Better see what Lae'zel thinks.
Oh, another githyanki disc? I should see Lae'zel - it's story time.
Lae will definitely want to see this.
Another gith disc. Lae'zel will have quite the collection.
Another githyanki disc. Lae'zel should see these.
Another disc etched with tir'su. Lae'zel might make something of this.
Another one of those githyanki discs. I should talk to Lae'zel.

EditorData.logicalname: Second book found - Previous not unlocked yet

Text.Value: This looks just like the other disc. More of Orpheus' sorry tale, perhaps?
A third slate written with tir'su? It seems Orpheus' story continues.
A third disc. What might this one have to tell us of Orpheus?
A third disc. Related to Orpheus, most likely.
A third disc with those strange markings? More githyanki tales, I hope.
Must be another part of the story of the gith prince - Lae'zel will want to see this.
More githyanki records - and perhaps more to learn of Orpheus, too.
A third disc. Related to Orpheus, somehow.
A slate written in ancient tir'su - more princely stories, I'd guess. Lae'zel will know for certain.
Still another githyanki disc - about the prince Orpheus, maybe. Lae'zel could make sense of it.

EditorData.logicalname: Third book found - Previous already unlocked

Text.Value: It's some kind of round gith... thing? Something for Lae'zel, I suppose.
This disc is marked by tir'su glyphs. I need a closer look.
A githyanki disc, covered in writing, perhaps? Lae'zel might be able to decode it.
Curious disc - looks githyanki. Lae'zel may know more.
Strange. Is this disc marked with... githyanki glyphs? Time for a word with Lae'zel.
Huh. Looks gith-y. Lae'zel might know the ins and outs.
Some manner of githyanki artefact, judging by the script. Lae'zel may know more.
A curious disc. Githyanki, perhaps. Lae'zel may know.
This disc is marked with tir'su - but I can't decipher them. Maybe Lae'zel can.
Such a strange disc. Are these githyanki markings? Lae'zel might know.
Another gith disc. If it's anything to do with this 'Orpheus', Lae'zel will want to know.
Another slate marked with tir'su. Still more tales of the prince?
Another githyanki disc. Another tale of the githyanki's lost prince?
Similar to that other Orpheus disc we found.
A githyanki disc? More tales of the prince, I shouldn't wonder.
Another story about a gith royal, maybe?
Hm - another annal of Orpheus, I think.
This looks like the other disc of Orpheus.
A slate marked with tir'su. Another Orpheus story, perhaps?
This gith slate looks like the other. Another story about the githyanki prince?

EditorData.logicalname: Second book found - Previous already unlocked

Synopsis:
Player comments that the disc they found looks weird and should be brought to Laezel. Plays again for each chapter found, with variations if you've already found the true text behind it.

Follow up in the LaezelInParty2 dialog.
